  • Reference

    Return a sample of magnitudes drawn from the GR distribution

    sample.GR.magnitudes.Rd

    Return a sample of magnitudes drawn from the GR distribution

    Usage

    sample.GR.magnitudes(n, beta.p, M0)

    Arguments

    n

    Number of events in the sample.

    beta.p

    Related to the b-value via b ln(10).

    M0

    Minimum magnitude for the sample.

    Value

    A list of magnitudes of length n drawn from a GR distribution.

    Examples

    sample.GR.magnitudes(n=100, beta.p=log(10), M0=2.5)
#>   [1] 2.628424 2.603155 2.658392 3.197318 3.266479 2.819594 2.609339 3.166154
#>   [9] 2.738211 2.581725 2.602850 2.781169 2.922208 2.733333 2.549241 2.623098
